TEXT.TITLE: LONDON GRAIN FREIGHT ENQUIRIES
TEXT.BODY: Antwerp/Libya 5,500 mt bagged flour 14 daps 24-27/4. New Orleans/Guanta 9,387 mt bulk hss 3,000/13 days 25-4/5-5. Naantali/Saudi Red Sea 30,000/35,000 mt barley 4,000/3,000 20-30/4 or early May. Dunkirk/Xingang 12,000 mt bagged flour 1,500/1,700 13-20/4. Toledo/Seaforth 17,000 mt hss offers 18.50 dlrs four days/8,000 13-15/4. River Plate/Malaysia 20,000/22,000 long tons hss 2,000/2,000 Apr. Reuter
